traceability.evidence: • bin/dry-aged-deps.js help text lists --config-file as “coming soon”, but no parsing logic for --config-file is present. • No code reads a config file or processes prod/dev objects from config. • No tests referencing or exercising --prod-min-age, --dev-min-age, --prod-severity, or --dev-severity flags. • Precedence logic mentions config file in requirements but is not implemented.
traceability.notes: Config-file support and related precedence rules are not implemented, and there are no tests covering the new prod/dev flags or config parsing. Thus not all acceptance criteria are satisfied.
